description:
There are a lot of mods for multiplayer horror game REPO, some adding quality-of-life changes or enhancements to multiplayer and some completely changing how you may play the game.

Pretty much all of the REPO mods are hosted on Thunderstore, and you can use either the Thunderstore app or the r2modman mod manager to easily handle and install the mods. (You can u
title: The best REPO mods

description:
“The Stray Dogs” is the final quest you’ll need to complete to recruit Yaya the monk as an ally in Assassin’s Creed Shadows. In it, you need to find a Kanzashi that was stolen by a guy named Tetsuo.

In this Assassin’s Creed Shadows guide, we’ll give you a full “Str
title: ‘The Stray Dogs’ walkthrough and Kanzashi location in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

description:
Helldivers 2 players have had to make some tough choices in the past few months, and the Meridia Singularity is continuing to advance on Super Earth, consuming whatever unfortunate planets lie in its wake. The Galactic War continues apace, but Arrowhead has encountered one problem: Players aren’t interested in fighting the game’s third faction, the scary and squid-like Illuminate.

The Illuminate arrived with a splash, invading the southern quadrant of the galaxy after
title: Helldivers 2 players are growing tired of fighting the slippery squids

description:
If you have been craving some good witch content, look no further.

Magical romantic comedy anime Witch Watch is all about a Nico, a young witch in high school. Sure, there’s a dire prophecy hanging over her foretelling some cataclysmic events… but that just means she gets to move in with her handsome childhood friend and crush Morihito (who happens to be an ogre) and attend a new school, full of kooky characters! Magic and mundane collide!

A new trailer showcasing the English voice cast also introduces some of
title: Watch Witch Watch’s new trailer for some witchy watchiness

description: Long-time holders of the BattleTech tabletop gaming license, Catalyst Game Labs, have something surprisingly grim and dark to talk about at this week’s AdeptiCon convention. BattleTech: Gothic, formally revealed on Facebook, adds massive monsters to the game of big stompy robots. It’s described as a “themed-box release” — something entirely new for the roughly 40-year-old franchise. The announcement of the “complete, stand-alone game experie
title: BattleTech: Gothic is not where we expected this franchise to go

description:
Collecting Lost Pages in Assassin’s Creed Shadows is a time-consuming process, but is one of the least dangerous ways to earn knowledge points (and thus get even stronger). They’re located in Temples.

In this in-progress Assassin’s Creed Shadows guide, we’ll not only show you where to find Temples but where to find all Lost Pages in each Temple.
title: Where to find Lost Pages in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

description: Smuggling resources in Assassin’s Creed Shadows lets you move large quantities of resources to your Hideout. You’ll find stockpiles (pallets) of resources in castles, some camps, and enemy-controlled temples. Smuggling them requires scouts.
title: How to smuggle resources in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

description:
If you’re getting started in REPO and you’re ready to deliver some antique goods to your generous creator, you’ll want a heads up about how some of the mechanics of the game work. While playing the tutorial may teach you the basics of how to play, it won’t explain REPO’s systems further.

REPO is the newest PC co-op horror game to play with your pals — and it’s also blowing up on Steam, too. As little robots, you’ll need to scourge through abandoned venues to collect valuables while hiding out from monsters haunting the halls. Like all great modern multiplayer games, there’s proximity voice chat that wil
title: 22 REPO beginner’s tips we wish we knew before playing

description:
If you’d like to upgrade your daily driver with a solid mechanical keyboard without spending a mint, Woot is offering discounts on a wide variety of keyboards from the Keychron catalog through April 3, many of which are on sale for their lowest prices ever.

Several members of the Polygon staff use Keychron keyboards every day, and they’re a great option if you’re looking for a customizable keyboard with excellent build quality that offers a wide variety of
title: Pick up a Keychron keyboard from Woot for its lowest price ever

description:
On Friday, Netflix released the first official trailer for The Summer Hikaru Died, the upcoming adaptation of Mokumokuren’s 2021 slice-of-life horror manga from anime studio CygamesPictures (Brave Bang Bravern!), slated to premiere in July.

The series centers on Yoshiki, a teenager living in a small town in rural
title: The Summer Hikaru Died looks both wholesome and utterly terrifying

description:
Sunderfolk, the ambitious co-op tactical adventure game built on a love of tabletop games, is coming to consoles and PC on April 23, developer Secret Door and publisher Dreamhaven announced Tuesday. Curious players can try out Sunderfolk with a first look demo through Nvidia’s GeForce Now game-streaming service from March 25 through April 7.

Secret Door’s debut title is inspired by tabletop games like Gloomhaven and Dungeons & Dragons, and uses smart devices as a controller, à la
title: Sunderfolk, the D&D-meets-Jackbox tabletop-inspired game, gets April release date

description:
Developer Moonshot Games, which is part of the studio founded by former Blizzard Entertainment CEO Mike Morhaime, revealed its long-in-development debut game on Tuesday. It’s call Wildgate, which its creators describe as “a crew-based first-person shooter.” That description seems to be underselling Moonshot Games’ ambitions for the multiplayer action game.

Wildgate, like Secret Door’s Sunderfolk, is actually a
title: Ex-Blizzard devs reveal spacey extraction space shooter Wildgate that looks, well, wild

description:
“The Kabukimono” is a quest in Assassin’s Creed Shadows that you can pick up once you reach Amagasaki in western Settsu.

You can technically (accidentally) start the quest and board on your Objectives menu before you officially pick up the quest if you bump into any of the Kabukimono. The actual quest starts when you speak to a monk named Shin’nyo and he tells you about some troublesome ronin disrupting the social harmony.<
title: All Kabukimono locations and rewards in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

description:
Makino Kurumakuka Kofun is a kofun in Assassin’s Creed Shadows, located in the northern tip of the Izumi Settsu province. Like all kofun in Shadows, it’s a poorly lit series of tunnels that’s extremely easy to get lost in, but if you navigate it successfully, you’ll get rare gear.

In this Assassin’s Creed Shadows guide, we’ll show you how to enter Makino Kurumazuka Kofun, alongside a full walkthro
title: Makino Kurumazuka kofun walkthrough in Assassin’s Creed Shadows

description:
The Fortnite found quest “Someone is planning a joyride” requires you to steal Fletcher Kane’s car and take it for a spin.

The found quest can be a little tricky to start as only one player attempt the quest at a time. If you see a player drive off with Cassidy Quinn in their car or Cassidy Quinn isn’t at her usual location, it might be too late for you. To help you be the first person to interact with Cassidy Quinn, we’ve marked her location on the Chapter 6 Season 2
title: How to complete ‘Someone is planning a joyride’ in Fortnite

description:
As part of a quest in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 2, you must use Henchman walkie talkies to eavesdrop on Kane.

The story quest doesn’t have any markers, so you’re left on your own to find all seven walkie talkies. Unfortunately, they’re spread around the map, so you’ll need to hunt down each walkie talkie while avoiding enemy players.

In this Fortnite guide, we’ve marked all Henchman walkie talkie locations on the Chapter 6 Season 2 map and detailed each location below.
title: All Henchman walkie talkie locations in Fortnite

description: Movie theaters: Who needs ’em? If you’ve already got even a decent TV in your house, you may be looking to augment your home theater setup with a 4K Blu-ray player, which will unlock a markedly better viewing experience than streaming movies from Netflix. In that case, look no further than the Panasonic DP-UB820, which is once again on sale at Amazon as part of the company’s Big Spring Sale. It’s down to $387.35, representing a
title: My terrific 4K Blu-ray player is 22% off during Amazon’s Big Spring Sale

description: Dungeons & Dragons’ Open Gaming License, also known as the OGL, allows creators to build on top of a portion of the existing 5th edition ruleset. Even after the debacle from a few years ago, that carve-out continues to pay dividends for fans — especially in the actual play space. There are other benefits, of course, including the boatload of content ava
title: How to print D&D’s new gold dragon at home

description:
Blizzard announced on March 24 its intentions to revive hardcore World of Warcraft Classic characters lost in a recent distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack, a malicious flooding of the game’s servers with request data by outside entities that caused widespread lag and, in some cases, even disconnections.

“Unlike the many other ways characters can die in Hardcore, DDoS attacks are an intentionally malicious effort made by third-party bad actors, and we believe the severity and results of DDoS attacks specifically warrant a different response,” Clay Stone, asso
title: World of Warcraft Classic hardcore characters lost to DDoS attacks may get a rare revive

description:
You won’t want to miss the inaugural discount on the 8Bitdo Ultimate 2 Wireless Controller at Amazon. Priced at $59.99 at launch back in February, you can pick up the Ultimate 2 for just $47.99 during Amazon’s Big Spring Sale. Thanks to its relatively low price point and extensive features, the original 8Bitdo Ultimate controller quickly established itself as one of our favorite third-party controllers, and the sequel builds on that legacy.

The Ultimate 2 is aesthetically similar to the original with its Xbox-style l
title: The 8Bitdo Ultimate 2 Controller just got its first discount on Amazon

description:
Best Hobby founder Daniel Block has, well… been around the block a few times. 

At 51, he’s already had an incredible career in tabletop gaming, first in the 1990s working on card games like Rage, Legend of the Five Rings, and Dune: Collectible Card Game. He then pivoted to video games, first joining up with Eve Online publisher CCP Games, and then moved on to Riot
title: While Fortnite flourished, one team member spent nights building his dream miniatures game

description:
At 550 pieces, K.K.’s Concert in The Plaza is Lego’s largest Animal Crossing set. If you’d like to bring this irresistible pup and his guitar home, this set is currently discounted to its lowest price yet for Amazon’s Big Spring Sale. Typically $79.99, this set is currently on sale for just $54.99 at Amazon. The set includes a replica of the Resident Services building and K.K.’s tour bus, along with minifigs of Isabelle, Audie, and K.K. Slider.

If
title: The biggest Animal Crossing Lego set just got its biggest discount yet

description: In the midst of all the Severance finale hubbub — which includes a full-on marching band, a good ol’ Gwendoline Christie brawl, an accidental murder, a slew of fuck yous, and some heartbreaking love triangle decisions — there is a rather strange kiss. Mark (Adam Scott) and Gemma (Dichen Lachman) have finally reunited
title: Severance’s Dichen Lachman is glad that severed kiss made you laugh

description:
Fortnite OG Chapter 1 Season 3 is crash-landing into Fortnite along with the return of Lucky Landing, the meteor, and the 50v50 limited-time mode.

Chapter 1 Season 3 was just the beginning of what made Fortnite what it is today with the introduction of a living map. Players can experience all of the original map and weapon loot pool changes as the season progresses, and wonder what is going to happen with the meteor in the sky.

A new season means map changes, new items, and, the most important of all, more skins. Below, we e
title: What are the new map and weapon loot pool changes in Fortnite OG Season 3?

description: It’s new monitor season, apparently, as Samsung is gearing up to launch its 2025 gaming monitors. Its lineup is both similar to and way more interesting than other manufacturers’. If you’re in the market for an upgrade, or not quite sure yet, Samsung is hoping to tempt you into reserving a pre-order by offering a $50 off coupon that’s redeemable for its new gaming monitors. To be clear, you won’t be putting any money down by reserving. This just gets you the coupon in case you decide to pre-order one.
title: Samsung’s 2025 gaming monitors are $50 off if you pre-order

description: From the moment it was announced, Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ interpretation of feudal Japan was met with immediate blowback — mostly from the West. The usual suspects were up in arms over the general identities of the protagonists, while others questioned the historical accuracy of the African samurai Yasuke, or the mere idea of having a non-Japanese protagonist when Naoe — a Japanese woman — was already in the mix as one of Shadows’ main characters. Despite it being an installment of a franchise rife with
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ Japanese reviews reframe the historical accuracy debate

description: I don’t mind getting lost in the classic board game Labyrinth when its hedges are littered with adorable Pokémon. Right now, the deceptively simple board game is on sale for just $20.99 at Amazon (was $29.99). Pokémon Labyrinth supports up to four players, with individual games lasting around 30 minutes, making it easy to fit multiple matches into an afternoon. Labyrinth is pretty great, but if you’d like to see more deals on board games or other gaming accessories, make sure to check out our roundup of the best deals from the
title: Pokémon Labyrinth is matching its Prime Day price

description: Via an adorable featurette starring Sean Astin, aka Samwise Gamgee, Lego has pulled back the curtain on its latest set inspired by The Lord of the Rings. The Shire Lego set will be available to pre-order for Lego Insiders on April 2 for $269. Everyone else will have a chance to reserve this set starting on April 5. If you’d like to pre-order this set ASAP, a
title: Lego’s next Lord of the Rings set takes us to The Shire

description:
What games do you think of when you think of Nintendo’s Switch? There are several obvious answers; Nintendo’s in-house studios never fail to leave their mark on a system with a handful of brilliant games. Yet one of the most notable things about the Switch, as it prepares to cede the limelight to Switch 2 after eight years on the market, is that it has been less software-dependent than, perhaps, any Nintendo console since the NES.

Of course the Switch wouldn’t be the success it has been withou
title: The 10 games that defined the Nintendo Switch

description: Amazon has just kicked off its Big Spring Sale, and while it may not be quite as large-scale as Prime Day, there are still plenty of excellent discounts on headsets, SSDs, and other gaming accessories you should definitely check out. Highlights include discounts on The Sony Inzone H9 Gaming Headset, the Anker 737 Power Bank, Batman: The Complete Animated Series on Blu-ray, and more. Below, y
title: Our favorite deals from the Amazon Big Spring Sale

description: No one in the year of our lord 2025 is going to argue it’s easy to make an anime. It’s perhaps a more straightforward process than it’s ever been in human history, but the artistry and imagination of it still requires a lot. Dive just a little bit into the background of any of your favorite shows and you’re liable to find tight timelines,
title: Zenshu was the best kind of love letter to everyone who loves anime too much

description:
Shining Revelry is an upcoming expansion for Pokémon TCG Pocket. This themed booster pack will build off the Triumphant Light expansion and add new cards, including snazzy new shiny Pokémon.

This expansion introduces Pokémon from the Paldea region and has a whole bunch of cards featuring
title: When does the Shining Revelry expansion release in Pokémon TCG Pocket?

description:
Cutiefly, the bee fly Pokémon from Alola, can be found in the wild in Pokémon Go. Yes, Cutiefly can be shiny in Pokémon Go!

Neither Cutiefly nor Ribombee see any meta use, but the fact that they’re cute lit
title: Can Cutiefly be shiny in Pokémon Go?
